{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = D-Link DWR-980.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1200 Wireless 4G LTE/VDSL2 Modem Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.dlink.com/en/products/dwr-980-wireless-ac1200-4g-lte-router |pp2 = http://d-link.ru/ru/products/5/2365_b.html |pp2alt = (RU) |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = D-Link_DWR-980_rev_A1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = D-Link |model = DWR-980 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = 4G LTE router, dsl modem, wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = KA2WR953B1 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = 234WR962A1 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8685PB; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = IA |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 750 MHz / 1 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = NAND |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = Mini PCIe, USB 2.0 |exp_minipcie_num = 1 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = VDSL2, 4G LTE, SIM Card slot, FXS, VoIP, |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Cameo |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 07/03/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192ER; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812BR;RTL8812BRH; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "234WR962A1 1HS1" and "DWA-962 REV.S1" are silkscreened on the board. <!--The device contains a ''[[BroadMobi]]'' BM806U-E1 Mini PCIe Card :''LTE Wireless Module'' P520_V2.0 (T2517)--> * 1x DSL (VDSL2), 2x FXS (VoIP), 1x USB 2.0 ports
==See also== :;[[D-Link DWR series]] *[[D-Link DWR-910 rev D1]] (D2) • [[Realtek]] • N150 • [http://d-link.ru/ru/products/5/2279_b.html PPage] (RU) :USB 2.0, microSD card slot (32GB), SIM, LTE, 5V/1A (D2 - No 2600MHz) *[[D-Link DWR-953 rev B1]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8685PB @1.0GHz • AC1200 • [http://d-link.ru/ru/products/5/2283_b.html PPage] (RU) :Flash: 16MB (SPI), RAM: 128MB (int. SoC), 5x GbE, SIM, LTE, 12V/1.5A :FCC ID: KA2WR953B1 (2018-07-03) - AC1200 Wireless 4G LTE Multi‑WAN Router *[[D-Link DWR-956 rev A1]] • [[Lantiq]] PXB4310 • AC1600 • [https://www.dlink.com/en/products/dwr-956-wireless-ac1200-4g-lte-router PPage] (B1) :Flash: 128MB (NAND), RAM: 128MB (DDR2), 4x GbE, USB 2.0, LTE, 12V/2A *[[D-Link DWR-956 rev B1]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8685PB @1.0GHz • AC1200 • [http://d-link.ru/ru/products/5/2296_b.html PPage] (RU) :Flash: 16MB (SPI), RAM: 128MB (int. SoC), 5x GbE, FXS, LTE, 12V/2A *[[D-Link DWR-980 rev A1]] • [[Realtek]] RTL8685PB @1.0GHz • AC1200 • [http://d-link.ru/ru/products/5/2365_b.html PPage] (RU) :Flash: 128MB (NAND), RAM: 128MB (int. SoC), 5x GbE, USB 2.0, VDSL2, LTE, 12V/2.5A
